question: I watched a video, how do I find the code for it?

answer.text: All videos on The Coding Train each have a page on this website that includes links to the source code. Well, they should, that is! We’re still working through building the site and there might be a few that are missing. Take a look at the YouTube video description and look for a link to thecodingtrain.com. If it’s not there, please [file an issue on GitHub with a link to the YouTube video with missing code](https://github.com/CodingTrain/thecodingtrain.com/issues/new).
